pageProduct.name: Palmers Shea Formula Moisturizing Raw Shea Balm 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Shea Formula Raw Shea Balm is perfect for drier areas such as knees, elbows and feet. Antioxidant-rich emollients create a protective moisture-seal to help prevent skin dehydration, and repair cracked, rough or callused skin.

Warnings

For external use only.

Common Uses

Formulated with Raw Natural Shea Butter, sustainably sourced in Africa. This rich, super nourishing ingredient is the building block for softer, radiant skin.

Ingredients

Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Canola Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Ozokerite, Tocopheryl, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Theobroma Cocao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde.

Directions

Use whenever your knees, elbows, hands or feet are feeling a little dry.
